page.title: 20Life Styles
page.content: Our community comprises all age groups. Some of the large houses are nursing and retirement homes so there are many elderly people. People aged between 20 and 60 work in three main areas: the Hospital; in education in surrounding schools or the nearby Polytechnic, or in business concerns. The{Village Hall}run by a voluntary Management Committee is the focal point of leisure activities. There are two clubs for the elderly plus one for retired men, two Womens Institutes, and active Scout and Guide Associations. There is also a Youth Group and a Playgroup and Toddler group for pre-school children. The {Village School}has 82 children aged from four to eleven. Children go to school from 09.00 to 15.45 on five days a week for 38 weeks of the year.
